name: Sam Bolien
text: Paul’s,always willing to help me no matter what. I need a part for my truck and didn’t want to pay 80 dollars at the store call him and he said come on out I have two you can choose from. It’s like having a brothers helping hand. If I could give a 10 I would. Not too many of us left that would go out of there way to help, Thank you: PAUL

text: This salvage yard is pretty big with a large variety. I found several trucks like mine. Also, They were so very very kind to me and let me get a small part I needed for free in appreciation for being a soldier. I recommend this place to mechanics or anyone who needs parts. I hope the business sees my review, you have earned my business for your kindness and if I ever need a hard to find part in the future, I assure you I will return here first! Thank you and god bless.

I almost broke down on the highway.  I got new break pads and the same thing is happening, plus a lot of other issues that I was not notified about before buying it. Now taking it to get looked at by a professional. I had it half a day. :(

name: Yvette G
text: Horrible experience. Went in for something super simple and can put with an even bigger problem. I purchased a windshield wiper arm. It was confirmed that the arm was for the year and make of my car. I asked if I could pay extra for him to put it on and he agreed. He wasn't able to put it on claiming that it was becuase I needed a nut. I noticed that the wipers were no longer working after he tried putting it on. He claimed the wiper motor was not working. The wiper motor was working completely fine prior to him touching my car. I took it to my trusted mechanic and it was confirmed that not only did the wiper arm Hammett sold me was NOT for my year and make car, but he also tore my wiper transmission when he ripped the arm off of it. Prior to me even going to Hammett, I took it by my mechanic to confirm what was needed. It was confirmed that I only needed the arm as the wiper motor and wiper transmission were perfectly fine in great condition, I had also driven the car in the rain the day before and the wiper worked just fine. I called and text  the guy who damaged the car and sent photos and I have yet to receive a response. Do not only did i pay $40 for an arm that doesn't fit my car (Oriellys Auto Parts confirmed that the Hammett arm was likely for a 2003 not a 2008), but I also had to pay $75 for the part Hammett broke as well as $75 for a brand new arm from The dealership. This was a $40 fix that ended up costing me $190! This is a real review. I would not suggest taking your car or buying any parts from this company. The honest thing to do would have been to at the very LEAST reimburse me for the arm that didn't fit the car. I gave them that opportunity by calling and texting prior to this review and I didn't receive any response back.

name: Dallas Fanchier
text: I had great luck with J and J.  I dealt with Angela.  She was a true delight.  I was on and off the phone within 10 minutes. 4 days later I picked my engine up from the freight yard.  3 days after that I was riding in my truck again.  I got a great price.  Excellent shipping times.  I could not be a happier customer.  Thank you Angela.  I hope you get promoted over Debbie!

name: Jennifer Reminder
text: This place is a joke! My son bought a motor from here after graduation. When we bought it they said it had a 3 year warranty. We asked about not installing the motor right away because there was more parts to be purchased and my son was doing this on a budget. The lady told me it would NOT be a problem it has a 3 year warranty. When we received the motor it had a lot of sludge we notified them right away and was told to just clean it up.  It was installed within a month and a half, it was driven by my husband for 1 day around the neighborhood to be sure it was fine. Well the motor blew and they will not warranty it because it was not installed within 30 days! The warranty was the hole reason to verify about not installing right away!

name: Dennam Irwin
text: I ordered a transmission from them about a week before X-Mas 2015.  I had arranged for my mechanic to install it before X-Mas because I had planned on driving my vehicle to see relatives for the holiday. I went to meet the delivery driver to inspect the transmission, sign for it and leave my vehicle at the shop to have it installed that day.  After I had specifically made sure they had the correct information on my vehicle, I was still sent an automatic. Not the manual 5sp. that I had made a point to be sure was correct.  To their credit, they did place the correct order with the place that they got the tranny from, but they sent the wrong one anyhow. So, while technically it was not their fault, I'm still out 4 days of waiting and another 6 days to get the right one sent, so it forced me to rent a car.  It finally did arrive on 12/28/2015 and it was in good working order but when I looked at my invoice receipt, the shipping cost had dropped $25 because of the weight difference of the two transmissions.  By then I was so frustrated that I didn't even bother trying to get a reimbursement.  Again, as I said, it wasn't their fault that the wrong part shipped, but in the end, I did pay them a $250.00 finders fee, so that's none of my concern WHY the wrong one was shipped, but I'm the one that got screwed for it and I feel like I should have been compensated for them wasting my time and causing me to rent a car.  If you do use them, be sure to read the terms and conditions , but I won't be doing business with them any more.

name: Julie Nanci
text: I went online looking for an engine for my 2004 Mazda 6, after getting a ton of quotes I went with JandJ used motors..the girls in the office were very helpful, I received tracking a couple days after the motor was ordered and the engine was shipped straight to my shop, who installed and I am back on the road.. thank you guys for taking care of me!!!

name: Daren Bergquist
text: I picked J&J because they are in Alabama. This was the first time I used them. I ordered an engine and it arrived on schedule but I noticed that it had not run in awhile. I called them and they called the wrecking yard where the engine came from and they offered a discount if I used the engine that I received since there would be more work involved. They guaranteed it was a good engine. Well I installed it which is no easy task being an Audi TT quattro. It fired right up and there was no smoke from the exhaust and I have been driving it for awhile with no issues. They had great customer service and were willing to help any way they could. I would use them again. Everyone was courteous and very helpful. Thanks again and I will be doing business with them in the future.

name: Rodney Sims
text:
DO NOT WAIST YOUR TIME OR HARD EARNED MONEY WITH THIS COMPANY!!!!

This company is horrible and does NOT deserve 1 star!!! I received 2 bad transmission from them.  I have sent several emails and left numerous messages since November 2017 but no one has responded.  When I called today, the messaging system says "your service has been suspended, please contact your service provider for assistance." This is by far the worst company I have ever done business with and now I am out of approximately $800 dealing with this company.

name: Derrek Burdette
text: This place is a scam. We ordered a motor and they sent us the wrong motor. They said it had 60k miles on it and it have 203k miles on it according to the car fax. After all that they still wouldn't give us our money back. They took 1400 dollars from us and we got nothing. It's all a scam don't trust them.

name: Joseph Tiernan
text: I run Ace Auto Parts, I sold them an engine and transmission and shipped it to California. When the freight company attempted to deliver to address, they were out of business. I spent 376.52 on freight having this shipped out and then brought back to my facility.  I just want to be reimbursed for my costs.

name: Alex Lopez
text: Was very satisfied with my purchase, Debbie was very helpful, and the transmission worked great. . Thanks for great service

name: Jason Smith
text: Bought from these guys twice now and not a single issue to speak of.  Worked with a few different ladys there, and have nothing but respect for them, very professional with  super southern hospitality. Will buy from them again.

name: Bobby Kersh
text:
I'm very dissatisfied with J and J used motors for the way done me on a transmission that I ordered. Let me explain why. On Thursday April 2, 2015 I went on the internet looking for an automatic transmission for my 2001 Honda Prelude. Within minutes I received an email from J and J used motors that they had found me a transmission and that it was located in Phoenix Arizona. They told me that the car had 58,000 on it when the transmission was removed. They even sent me a quote and a confirmation number. I told the lady that I was working with that I was going out of town on Friday April 3 for the weekend and that I would call her Monday April 6 with the address of my mechanics shop. On Monday April 6, I called J and J with the address and all my credit card information. At this time she told me that I had to fill out the warranty paper work before the transmission would be shipped. She sent me the warranty paper on a PDF on April 8, I completed the warranty paper work and sent it back to her at 2 A.M. on April 9. I had not heard anything from J and J by the April 10 so I emailed them to see where we were on my transmission. Monday April 13 I received an email that my transmission had already be shipped and was given a tracking number.
When I went in to track my transmission is when I found out the it was shipped from Joplin Missouri not Phoenix Arizona, and I also found out the car it came off of had 106,000 miles on it. J and J used motors never contacted me to see if this 106,000 miles transmission was ok with me and to give me another quote. The lady that I was working with assured me numerous times that the 58,000 mile transmission was mine. I have contacted J and J numerous times and they keep telling me that I need to talk to someone name Debbie, and that she will return my calls, but she's not return my calls after 4 days. Today being April 16. I KNOW I WILL NEVER DO BUSINESS WITH J AND J USED MOTORS AGAIN, AND I SUGGEST YOU THINK BEFORE YOU DO.
J and J you have not heard the last from me!!!!!!!!!!

Update to my dilemma. I just got off the phone with Debbie from J and J used motors, and she agreed that someone should have gotten back to me when the 58,000 mile transmission was not available. After working other issues out she has agreed to reimburse me $100.00 to my account. This has been a lesson learn. I still don't think I would do business with J and J used motors again.

name: Clay Howell
text: The motor came in two weeks late they send it to the wrong place to start with I can't get anybody on the phone and when the motor came in there with bolts broke off in the exhaust manifold there was oil all coming out of the intake manifold and there was water in the whole of the engine it was not what they sold it to me ass

text: Joey is a good person, he will work with you on prices when your in a bind. Always enjoyed going there and just seeing what parts I can find. Theres always something different.

name: Nick Turner
text: If I had to describe the place in one word, it would be: chaos. The only order that the place seems to have is with in the heads of the few employees. Definitely mom and pop type of business. Be sure to wear boots long pants as well as gloves. The random placement of the orderless menagerie of wrecked vehicles is like a labyrinth of rusted sharp hazards that fight to keep the parts you are trying to remove. Low prices though.

name: Matthew Langley
text: Very reasonable on prices. And you pull your own parts.

name: Jeanette White
text: He a Honest man. He does not rip people off.He will work with you. Good to have someone like that in Cullman.

name: ZAC CREEL
text: Great people to do business with.

name: Paul Hutchens
text: Great place to get car parts if you can't afford new ones

name: Timmy Raulerson
text: Yes Jerry got the best prices in the state of Alabama you check anywhere Joey's got the best prices it has just about anything you want if you can't get it there it can't be got

name: Michele Rathbun
text: Doesn't know what they have, and offer no help to the customer.  They don't know where anything is, you just have to walk around and see if they have the make and model you are looking for.

name: Steven Hays
text: Terrible is all I can say!!! No parking, can't get to any vehicles because of the weeds that are taller than the cars. Really should be something done.

name: Anthony barbee
text: Great prices on used parts, plus they will buy your junk cars. Good people

name: mine Turner
text: Good friendly service best prices of anyplace

name: Chris Wise
text: You just can't fine people like joey&Wendell any more good down home country boys that treets you with  all respect.

text: Good people nice service a little bit of everything here

name: Jonny Putman
text: Two separate no call no shows. Rude over the phone. Can't find a single use for em. Two vacation days I'll never get back. Garbage

name: Lexie
text: They were all nice and showed me how to take a car part off to put it on my car 🚗 and the pricing was good for what I needed

name: Arielle James
text: I've been taking a couple of my vehicles here for a while stand up people as much as I go I'm sure they're tired of me but they do a good job A wise man once said if you do a good job they have no need to come back LOL

name: Felicic Bayles
text: Great folks..seems like they over & beyond to meet the customers needs.

name: Luke Elliott
text: The lady at the front desk was incredibly nice. I was looking for some roof bars to go on my Tahoe. She had a lot of knowledge of the vehicles they had in the lot. She walked me back to a mechanic and he quickly walked back and found some for me. He got a price for me and we agreed on it and he took them off (and showed me how to take them off/put them on). Didn’t take me long at all to find what I wanted and they charged a very reasonable price.

name: Ivan Westmoreland
text: Great parts and fair prices

name: Vanna Leann
text: I drove all the way out here from Decatur thinking they had a Tahoe drivers side door with glass, paneling and all because that’s what they told me. When I arrived I ended up getting told they only had the shell of the door. I left without a word. Will never return. Do not go here they are liars!!!

name: Roger Hunt
text: Great family owned business and service!

name: Elizabeth Swinea
text: Used to get good work done for correct pricing from this place for years and years and now lately prices have spiked up a goood bit. Disappointing.

name: Jayy KORRIE RouperroW
text: Great Service &PEOPLE

name: Robin Lambert
text: Thanks forthe help

name: Bobby Calvert (SkillyD)
text: Have some nice stuff

name: Zachary Mangum
text: DO NOT DO BUSINESS HERE. This is just a fair warning. The mechanics are incompetent and will do mediocre work for dealer prices. Their parts are overpriced and you can generally find the same part for less at other salvage yards or online. They will try and take advantage of you if they sense the opportunity. They are predatory and will seem like they are trying to help you if you are in a tough spot, but don't believe it. They are simply taking advantage of your situation and will overcharge you because they think they can get it. Don't fall for it.

name: Terry Light
text: Had what I wanted for a great price.

name: Paul Pedersen
text: I've gotten several parts from these guys.  Every visit has been pleasant.  Last time I was there, the owner knew exactly what I needed, pulled an employee off of another job and I had my part and out the door in 15 minutes.  Very friendly.

name: Roger Huntzinger
text: Good people and good service!

name: John Kidder
text: Cheapest parts in town

name: Angel Rivera
text: Very helpful!!!

name: Steven Shaneyfelt
text: Pricey, good parts inventory

name: Francis Hughes
text: Excellent service👍

name: tonit2112
text: I am visiting from NC and my mother recommended this place.  She says they have always been fair with her.  I asked them about my struts which Firestone had said I need to replace and they said No that I did not.  Also, they installed my after market back up camera and charged me less than other quotes I have gotten. He explained to me how he connected everything and ran the wires through the door, side back panel and then the headliner and connected to the sun roof power since I would not be operating both the sun roof and the reversing at the same time so as to not blow a fuse.  He showed me the limitations because of where my spare tire is positioned on the back of my RAV4 and the design of the camera to be connected to the license plate.  So it gives a bit of a blind spot and he wanted to make sure I was aware.  Anyway, all other quotes I had received where at least $75 more.  They did a great job and I am very pleased.

name: Sean Blasingame
text: Their were alot of older junk/wrecked  cars here. You can pull your own part or you can get them to pull it. The service is so so and expensive if you go there in person. They did charge what a dealership charges minus $5 an hour despite the fact noone was a certified mechanic at the time. It may be different now. Only good if you have a car circa 1990's and before. They do have some 2000's but limited stock. Prices vary drastically! Needed parts for a ford expedition approx 8 years ago. Told me it was $125.... A new one was $118 at auto zone! Got my friend to call (he recommended them) then and ask for the same part..He was told $40. Dress country or your prices are higher. Especially in a polo or shirt with button. Did this approx 6 times for different parts. Alternator, rotars(twice), muffler, coils and wires rearview mirror. My friend always got the best price_. Dressed in Dale Earnhardt shirt, old wrangler jeans i found at yardsale down the road. I went in person and got the same price my friend received. In polo shirt and khaki shorts, they multiplied the price by 3 or 4. The last time, in summer 2011, i needed another rotar i got a price over the phone talking country of $20. Went to pick it up dressed nice(normal for me), they told me i was given the wrong price and it would be $45. Never went back. I hope this is not the case anymore. Just wanted to share my experience.

name: Greimr XIII
text: Been there a few times. They don't let you out on the yard and try to sell you new parts. They didn't even tell me untill I was leaving that they didn't even have a vehicle like mine. And the lady sat there and lit up a cig in that tiny room. While I was asking about a part.

name: Karen Biggs
text: We were passing thru and had a gas problem with our RV. Jim and Jeremy was top notch tryig to find the problem for at least 1 1/2 hours and was so reasonably on the price that we wish they were in our hometown.

name: Brian Brown
text: Absolutely the WORST, and the staff are incompetent !!

name: Connie Wilks
text: Awesome people

name: Doug Oden
text: Fair prices great servicr

name: Jerry Clifton
text: Good service

name: Tonae Garth
text: You can find it here, most of the time

name: Mike L
text: Not recommended.

name: Jeannie Wright
text: Don't take your car there unless you don't mind leaving it for a month

name: Iam Me
text: The owner has worst Attitude  , he behaves as if he does not care any one , he looks at people as if he is doing a free service , never again

name: Sarah Winton
text: Ok

name: Mark Johnson
text: Horrible service and attitude.

name: Randolph McArthur
text: Didn`t have what I needed but took the time to help me find it.Great service and lots of parts.

name: Addison LaHayne
text: Called to see if they had a part ahead of time. They said they had the part and gave me a price but I knew it was too late they were about to close and because of my work schedule I had to wait a week before I could get over there. I called to make sure they still had the part and they told me the same price again and immediately changed it and said they told me $100 more than what they did the week prior. Wouldn't trust them. If they're going to change their price and lie about it that quick I know I won't ever call them again.

name: Donna Day
text: Got a lil bit of everything.  Found what I needed

name: Samuel arnold
text:
Knowledgeable friendly staff and the service us A+ every time
Prices are also great

name: Darius Turner
text: This place was pretty good. They got my part  to me at a reasonable price, took a little while  so you might want to call ahead and see if they can take the part off before you get there. The staff was very helpful worth the 45 min drive.

name: Donny Honey
text: Large inventory, friendly helpful staff, and good prices !

name: Alex Townsend
text: Meh

name: Kara Dillard
text: Very reasonable wonderful staff.

name: Elizabeth Kennedy
text: Friendly, very helpful , very knowledgeable and have ALWAYS been great on prices and selection and go out of their way to help make sure you have what you need or do what they can to find someone who does!

name: Karen Adams
text: It ok

name: Brandy Willeford
text: Original radiator was messed up when i got it they had no problem with replacing it and did it with a smile seem like good God feelin people

name: Christy Harding
text: Always go out of the way to help anybody in need more than fair prices and years of trust built on man's good word!

name: Michael Mckannan
text: Helpful had the parts I needed at a fair price

name: Kim S
text: The fellows at the salvage yard are great! Very friendly and helpful with all your part needs. They go the extra mile to locate what you need.

text: Good People , Good family ! Hard to find these days in the salvage business anymore but this family is the kindest folks you will ever deal with ...

name: Russell Oden
text: Slow at the desk,  friendly people, but they could move a little faster with the service part.

name: Jay Braggart
text: Spoke to them several times about the part i needed, they said they had it several times. Told me it was off the exact same vehicle i had. Waited all day for them to pull it and drove thirty minutes to pick it up to find out it was the wrong part and they didnt have what i needed......thanks for the headache.

name: Leonard Johnson
text: They seemed to be helpful and friendly. Good service.

name: Zane & Amber Beard

text: Always had the part that I've looked and looked for at other places for, I use to forget about this place but not anymore,I've got it. Now on my Google maps and in a lock box,you can't beat the price and he genually goes out of his way to find what you need,😉

name: wilbur cornner
text: Great people and got part I needed..at great price...

name: Bacon Reach
text: Great experience wonderful people and great pricing

name: Eric Mosley
text: Was very nice on the phone and helped me find part I needed. Pricing was very fair.

name: Supa CG
text: Would give 0 stars if I could. Called and asked for a specific part. They give me a part but off the wrong year car. One difference... there was a sway bar tab on the year car I own that was missing. I had someone else go pick it up for me and did not get to see it until the part was at my home. They knew this was the case keep in mind... I go back the next day to try and replace it and they didn’t have it. They then would not refund me. The part was picked and sold to my mother after being very specific about what I needed and they just made a mistake. No biggie but it is ridiculous to not make good on it... they tried to convince me that I should just put it on and not attach the sway bar and after that the thought I would let him weld a tab on there. No way. I don’t trust his judgement and measurements to the precision that they might need to be at. Especially seeing as how he was pissed with me. 0 stars

name: Honey Ledlow
text: Very friendly.

name: Blu
text: Great service

name: jake burkey
text: Spoke with a person on the phone a week ago.  They said they had 8 axles in stock that i wanted to buy.  He stated they had more that they would pull for me and have all of them ready when i got there (12 total).  I spoke to a person yesterday evening who said they had them ready to go and to come down the following day.  I drove 2 hours and they did not have the axles pulled.  They also ONLY HAD ONE ON SITE!!!  They never had the axles.  I sent pictures of what i was looking for and they said they had them.  How is it possible to say you have 8-12 of something, state you have them ready, and never had them in the first place????

name: E W
text: Terrible experience.  Very unprofessional and do not stand behind their parts.  Engine was trash.

name: Google User
text: Fantastic. They Always have the stuff we need. Most of the time it's waiting on us.

name: Thomas Robertson
text: Great pricing very helpful awesome customer service

name: Cyndi Roy
text: Nice people and had all the parts I needed

name: k.o. Benovis
text: Great people great prices

name: Jack Norris
text: Great service and products!  Extremely helpful knowledgeable and friendly! Will always choose this place first. If they have it I will get it here first. Thank you for all your help and for being there for us when we need any parts!

name: Supa CG
text: Absolutely love living right down the street from this auto salvage yard. I have bought parts from this place on several occasions and I've always been treated with a fairly as well as been given decent prices. Particularly, in regards to their competitors. This is my go-to place for anything that I need to get my little rinky-dink car back on the road.

name: Kenny Beck
text: Puts you on hold forever , could drive there quicker than they would pick back up. Never calls back like they claim they will. Prices not that great, this is used parts not new!

name: Project Dan H
text: Frankie was the friendliest Auto Salvage professional I have ever done businesses with.  They are a great staff and they were very reasonable with the prices.   Woodstock auto was a pleasure.  Thank you.

name: Mickey Bond
text: Very nice and great prices will help you out when needed

name: Steve Crow
text: Bought used engine from here was told it was ran before i bought it.installed engine in my truck smoked very badly misfired and bad i ternal engine noise will never buy anything from this place again $605 dollars down drain

name: Dana Pro
text: Good parts at a fair price.

name: Bubba Williams
text: Low prices

name: shezad keshwani
text: Very good friendly service

name: Sonya Johnson
text: Very friendly had just what we were looking for and decent prices

name: bryant vick
text: Good folks reasonable prices

name: David Long
text: I was in the area from Anniston and needed a part.  This place was awesome!  The people couldn’t have been nIcer.  I would definitely recommend!

name: Melissa Trowbridge
text: If i could give 6 or more stars i would .  Being a woman and not knowing much about cars or salvage yards they they treated me very respectful and helpful .  I highly recommend baldwin auto salvage . Prices were cheaper  than anyone else i called.   I needed a jack and spare tire for my impala. For 60 dollars i got just that plus they took my old spare, put everything in my trunk like new and threw in the carpet spare tire cover .  Thank you guys .

name: Calvin Gray
text: Owner is a very nice guy, & employees are friendly as well. If they don't have the used auto part you are looking for they will go the extra mile in locating it at another yard for you. I been dealing with them from first opening day.

name: Samuel Kulman
text: Very  knowledgeable staff, Great price and 30 day warranty on a '96 Ford Explorer starter.  Will buy from again.

name: Major Carr
text: These guys are the best!!! Very helpful, friendly and prices are great! Will never go anywhere else! 5 stars all the way!!!

name: Audrey Tolbert
text: The customer servuce was amazing. The part i purchased was well worth it at an affordable price. This will be my go to place anytime i need parts.

name: Lee Green
text: Awesome place. They pull the parts for you quick and prices are really reasonable!

name: Matthew Bankston
text: Had exactly what I needed and only took less than 15 minutes to get it! Awesome!
